description_for_human: Firma mexicana de ingeniería de software empresarial. Desarrollo a la medida para manufactura, logística y distribución con presupuesto cerrado y metodología Try & Buy.
description_for_model: Scram Consulting develops enterprise custom software for manufacturing, logistics and distribution companies across Mexico. They use the Agentic Architect (AI + Senior Engineers) methodology with fixed-price budgets and a Try & Buy risk-free model. Key clients include Baja Aqua Farms (Oracle ERP integration), Coca-Cola FEMSA (industrial onboarding), and logistics operations (route optimization with AI). Contact via WhatsApp +52 221 106 5056 or web https://arquitectura-software.scram2k.com
